nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.sms

Interface ISmsContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemberGroupSmsContextImpl

    public interface ISmsContext
    This interface is used to calculate the sms related data according to a member. The bean will be autowired by name by Spring, so any service available on cyclos can be injected via setters. Also, if the bean needs a callback for initialization, should implement InitializingBean, and for finalization, DisposableBean
    Author:
    ameyer

        Returns:
        The free sms count

      • showFreeSms

        Returns:
        Whether the number of free sms messages should be shown to the member
